title: BRIEF-Suncorp Group Signs Agreement To Sell Capital S.M.A.R.T And ACM Parts To AMA Group
text:
BRIEF-Suncorp Group Signs Agreement To Sell Capital S.M.A.R.T And ACM Parts To AMA Group

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 01, 2019 09:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Suncorp Group Signs Agreement To Sell Capital S.M.A.R.T And ACM Parts To AMA Group Oct 1 (Reuters) - Suncorp Group Ltd : * ANNOUNCES BINDING AGREEMENT TO SELL CAPITAL S.M.A.R.T AND ACM PARTS * SALE OF CAPITAL S.M.A.R.T TO AMA VALUING 100% OF THE BUSINESS AT $420M * CO TO RETAIN A 10% STAKE IN CAPITAL S.M.A.R.T AND A SUBSIDIARY BOARD SEAT * AFTER-TAX PROFIT ON SALE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $275-$295 MILLION * SALE CONSIDERATION WILL BE IN THE FORM OF UPFRONT CASH PROCEEDS AND THE RETENTION OF A 10% INTEREST IN BUSINESS * SUNCORP ANNOUNCING SALE OF ACM PARTS PTY LTD TO AMA FOR CASH CONSIDERATION OF $20 MILLION * UNDER TERMS OF THE TRANSACTION, SUNCORP WILL CONTINUE TO USE ITS EXISTING VALUED NETWORK OF SMASH REPAIR PARTNERS.

BRIEF-Suncorp Group Signs Agreement To Sell Capital S.M.A.R.T And ACM Parts To AMA Group
